name: Nitori & the One-Shot Cube
description:
Game made for the "Touhou Fan Game Jam 2" and also first game i've actually "completed". 

You play as Nitori Kawashiro. She was summoned in a strange dimension while studying an unknown cubic device found in the woods. Will she be able to return to Gensokyo with the help of her cube and its mysterious one shot power?

Controls

  • Hold Z to shoot
  • Arrow keys or WASD to move or aim while in shoot mode
  • Escape to quit
  • R to reset the current stage
  • Edit (from v1.1): F3 to skip stage

You can only shoot one bullet per stage. When your bullet hits a wall it will split in multiple smaller bullets. Kill all enemies to continue to the next stage.

The game is made in Unity 2018.2.0f2.

Sound effects are taken from https://freesound.org.

Edit:

I uploaded version 1.1 that fixes a game breaking bug in levels with rotating enemies, some layer sorting issue and some hp adjustments. Version 1.0 is still downloadable.
